text: Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete (born 7 October 1951) was the fourth President of Tanzania, in office from 2005 to 2015. He has also served as the Chairman of the African Union in 2008-2009 and the Chairman of the Southern African Development Community Troika on Peace, Defence and Security in 2012-2013. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Tanzania Category:African Union chairpersons
title: Jakaya Kikwete
